_**Assistant**_

```bash
source backend/venv/bin/activate && pip install djangorestframework django-cors-headers djangorestframework-simplejwt django-cron django-redis django-simple-history drf-yasg django-debug-toolbar -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
```
